nodes.text: Prince Tavin Korden was a male member of the noble house House Korden who served as the leader of the firm Korden Outfitting and Surveying during the waning years of the Galactic Republic and the time of the Galactic Civil War. Following the rise of the New Order, Korden displayed a dislike for the new regime while at a meeting of Corulag's Planetary Assembly and as a result, the Sith Lord Darth Vader began harassing him. Korden's close friend Baron Orman Tagge shared the prince's dislike for Vader and together, Korden and Tagge developed a number of subtle schemes that worked against Vader.
